title: Elevate Psychology Website
short_desc: A modern, calming web presence for Elevate Psychology in Nairobi.
long_desc: Waystar designed and developed a serene, user-friendly website for Elevate Psychology, making it easy for clients to learn about services, book appointments, and access resources.
challenge: The client needed a welcoming, professional site to build trust and streamline client engagement.
solution: Waystar delivered a custom WordPress site with intuitive navigation and a calming aesthetic.

title: Inlaw Legal Website
short_desc: A professional digital platform for Inlaw Legal in Nairobi.

challenge: Inlaw Legal needed a digital presence that reflected their credibility and simplified client intake.
solution: Waystar built a custom theme with clear calls to action and robust contact features.

title: Nairobi Feast Platform
short_desc: A dynamic restaurant discovery platform for Nairobi Feast.

title: Cut Central POS System
short_desc: A tailored POS solution for Cut Central Barbershop in Nairobi.
